Use Case: When a concept provides the definition for another concept
Example: Advanced System Dynamics DEFINES System Dynamics

Use Case: When concepts have causal or influential relationships
When sources or other claims provide evidence for a claim
Example: Research Paper SUPPORTS Climate Change Claim

Use Case: When one claim contradicts another claim
When a concept is derived from a particular source

Description: A question raises or is about a concept
Use Case: When a question is related to or raises issues about a concept

Description: Essays that reference or discuss nodes
Use Case: When essays discuss or reference concepts/claims/sources/questions
